reviewText:
My kids have loved Blaze since the show first came out and they continue to watch it if they catch it on. The show may seem like an action-packed car (truck) show but it does really have some good lessons in it. The lessons being teamwork, responsibility, confidence, and problem solving, just to name a few. This DVD even feature STEM topics including learning about Sound Waves. The example being that sound waves move through the air and travel to your ear to hear the noise, you hear Blaze's fire truck siren because sound waves bring the noise right to you. I read this to my kids (its on the box) before we watched and throughout the DVD I could see them thinking about sounds and how they work. I love when there is educational topics blended in with kid shows! You can also watch this DVD in Spanish and French!

I received this DVD complimentary in exchange for sharing my honest opinion.

THERE ARE 4 EPISODES IN THIS DVD:
BLAZE AND THE MONSTER MACHINES EPISODE 15: TROUBLE AT THE TRUCK WASH,
BLAZE AND THE MONSTER MACHINES EPISODE 20: SNEEZING COLD,
BLAZE AND THE MONSTER MACHINES
EPISODE 21: FIRED UP!
AND
BLAZE AND THE MONSTER MACHINES EPISODE 30: FIVE ALARM BLAZE

My son loves Blaze. He has Blaze everything. I bought this to have on our longer car rides to use with our portable DVD player. So much easier than having him wear down my phone battery watching Prime videos. So far, we've watched it in the car and at home. We've had no problems with the DVD skipping. He loves getting to have his favorite cartoon available on our frequent roadtrips.

Being my husband and I have up cable we have bought our sons a few DVDs. They both love Blaze and were excited to see this. As the DVD started both of their eyes lite up as if they were opening presents on Christmas morning. The older one is excited to be able to bring this on our longer car trips.

Blaze is for anyone who likes cars!
Great little movies, kids stay glued to the TV when we put these in.

My 3yr old is a huge Blaze and the Monster Machines fan and he was so excited to get this one! He loves that Blaze fights fires and the episode trouble at the truck wash is a favorite. The other episodes sneezing cold(very funny), five alarm blaze, and fired up are all very good. The only thing I wish is that they would put more episodes on each DVD.
OK, I don't really love it but my grandson does, and that's all that matters.
